title: Textile, ca. 1860
medium:
Medium: wool (worsted)
Technique: block printed on the warp-face float of 5-harness 4x1 satin .
dimensions:
Repeat H x W (minimum): 85 x 39.5 cm (33 7/16 x 15 9/16 in.)
Warp x Weft: 147 x 120 cm (57 7/8 x 47 1/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Textile Department Fund
description: Half drop repeat of hot house type flowers including a palm in bright colors on a plum color background. Fabric cut at edges of pattern repeat. Lengths of fabric would continue pattern. Z spun, S ply.
